snippet.title: Guardian of Lore Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Become the "Guardian of Lore". Rescue #LatinAmerican folktales and myths from oblivion. Personalize your gameplay with weapons, magic spells, and different skins in our 2D World with 3D characters.

Wishlist on #steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1211740/Guardian_of_Lore/

Follow on Social Media:
https://twitter.com/GuardianOfLore
https://www.instagram.com/guardianoflore/

Join our community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/tNwwYwy

En español:
https://www.facebook.com/Guardian.of.Lore

Guardian of Lore is being developed by Round 2 Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
